description: Try our easy to follow Perfectly Balanced Beef, Carrot & Lentil Sausage Tray Bake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Mains,Sausage,Roast,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Traybake,Sesame free,Beef,Potato,Wheat free,Sweet potato,Pork,Tomato,Peanut free
name: Perfectly Balanced Beef, Carrot & Lentil Sausage Tray Bake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 red capsicums, cut into thick slices
2 red onions, peeled and cut into wedges
2 medium sweet potatoes, skin on, cut into chunky wedges
2 bunch cherry tomatoes on the vine
3 medium waxy potatoes, cut into chunky wedges
1 pkt beef & pork Italian style sausages

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 200°C / 180°C fan forced. Drizzle a large roasting tray with olive oil.
Put the potatoes, sweet potatoes, peppers and garlic in a large zip lock bag. Add spices, herbs and a large drizzle of olive oil. Shake the bag to coat vegetables.
Spread vegetables onto the tray in a single layer and place sausages, lemons and onions amongst them.
Roast for about 30 minutes. Place sausages and add the tomatoes on the vine, drizzle with olive oil. Cook for a further 15 – 20 minutes.
Serve with balsamic glaze and a green salad.
